Subject: Born again.

Shadow Wing::

She walked around outside.  She followed her nose and found a small 
stream near the base. She frolliced in the water. It was cool and 
made her new skin tingle. She played like a cub.  She caught a few 
fish and played some more.  She then got out of the water and layed 
down in the grass.  It was wonder. She layed in the sun, basking in 
it heat and light.  Her fur seamed to take on a slight glow in the 
sun. She smiled and looked around as  she layed there. The trees were 
so green and lush, the birds sang and flied around.  The flowers were 
vibrant with color.  It was like she was discovering the beauty of 
the world for the first time.  She knew that the sky was blue and the 
grass was green, but for the first time, she really saw just how blue 
and how green things were. She closed her eyes and inhaled deeply. 
She could smell the grass under her.  The wind carried the scents the 
animals that were around in the area. She felt like she was in 
paradise. 

She woke up a little while later. About an hour had past. She got up 
and stretched. She felt her wings getting stronger as well as the 
rest of her.  She thought about Lunarpine and wondered if he would 
like such a place. She walked back to the base.  She could the scent 
of something that she hadn't smelled before.  It was another bot. She 
walked closer to the ship.  The scent was much stronger.  She wasn't 
sure who she was picking up on, but she wanted to make sure Veratis 
was alright.  She walked in and looked around for him. "Veratis? 
Where are you?" She had kept her mind closed, for fear of intruding 
on his private thoughts.  She didn't mind this new ability, but she 
didn't always want to know what a bot was  thinking either.
